transcript:
Executive: Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is a
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hi sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Very good afternoon.
Executive: Yes sir, main Ayushi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se account manager sir. Actually aapka concern aaya tha aapka video meeting aapko karne ki sir. Kuch seller dashboard vagera samajhna tha.
Customer: Toh available hai abhi aap video meeting ke liye?
Customer: Main abhi toh present mein toh main thoda bahar aa gaya. Mujhe ek woh tha issue tha, maine abhi se mere ko six month ho gaya hai yeh membership liye hue.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Toh mere samne se koi bhi mere paas call inquiry nahi inquiry nahi aati.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Iska kya reason hai? Kuch bata sakte hain? Matlab ki samne se aise koi mere paas order ke liye aise koi personally call nahi aata ki hum udhar se baat kar rahe hain, humko yeh cheeze product chahiye. Ya aisa call nahi aata mere paas.
Executive: Toh sir abhi jaise main recent mein agar main baat karta hu toh abhi recent ke saat din mein paanch, paanch din aise buyleads vagera pe active hai aur 17 inquiry aayi hai sir aapke paas.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: 17 inquiry agar saat din ke andar andar aayi hai sir. Aur agar main 30 din ki baat karu toh sir 27 inquiry agar aap abhi video meeting process mein aapko proof agar show karwati kyuki maintain aisa hai na. Haan haan haan.
Customer: Woh toh samne se woh toh samne se.
Customer: Lekin ab mere mere paas samne se koi inquiry kyun nahi aati? Yeh batao mere ko.
Executive: Sir samne ke liye bata rahi hu main aapko. Yeh samne ki inquiry sir aapne buyleads consume ek toh buyleads consume kar rahe hain aap. Theek hai? Consume karke aapko apne client mil rahe hain. Ek jo main yeh aapko bata rahi hu na inquiry call, yeh samne wale hi hain sir. Samne saat din ke andar andar aapke paas 17 inquiry aayi hai sir. All over India se jo bhi aapke paas hai. Aa rahi hai sir, suniye yeh sir nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Samne se kaha pe dekhte hain aap sir?
Executive: Inquiry inquiry sir. Calls nahi hai. Inquiry ki agar main baat karu. Inquiry aayi hai sir aapke paas. Aap na waha pe check karte hain sir kabhi jaise lead manager pe lead manager pe jaake inquiries vagera dekhte hain ek baar apne yaha ki kitne kaha se kis cheez ki aayi hui hai.
Executive: Lead manager pe jab jaate hain na toh waha toh ek aapko jo buyleads aap consume karte hain na woh bhi dikhte hain. Woh buyer bhi aapko waha dikhte hain. Lekin jo na direct inquiry aati hai jaise kabhi calls toh nahi aayi kyuki calls toh humare paas data nahi show ho raha hai. Call kuch bhi nahi hai but inquiry aayi hai sir. 74 inquiries 90 din ke andar andar aa rahi hai sir. Toh inquiries toh aa rahi hai. Agar kabhi kabhi inquiries kuch matlab miss ho rahi hai na toh ek baar aap apne ek baar lead manager ke LMS pe aap ek baar na usko dhyaan se dekhiye. Kuch ho sakta hai ki kuch lead wahi pe hoti hai. Jo bhi aapko direct inquiry aati hai wahi dikhega aur aapko kahi nahi dikhega sir. Inquiries aapko hamesha aapke lead manager. Haan.
Customer: Main abhi driving kar raha hu. Main 30 minutes mein system pe pahuch jaunga. Ab main aadhe ghante mein call kar sakte hain?
Executive: Haan definitely sir aapka interest aapka show tha video meeting ke liye aap agar aadhe ghante baad available hai definitely sir main aapko connect kar lungi but 5:30 ke andar sir. Hai na? Coordinate kar lungi. Okay. Toh aap is sab karo aapko main 5:30 call karu.
Customer: Mere ko 50 available ho jayega. 5:30 kar lena aap mere ko.
Executive: Kab kar lu?
Customer: 5:20 pe.
Executive: 5:20 kar lu? That's great sir, no issue. Aur sir actually aapke paas abhi concern aapne humare paas raise kiya tha toh aapki ticket open hui hai sir. Toh abhi main kya ticket close kar sakti hu agar video meeting toh hum kar lenge. Abhi aap allow karte hain us cheez ke liye?
Customer: Okay. Sure sir.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul definitely. Close.
Executive: Theek hai toh main ticket ek baar apne end se close kar de rahi hu kyuki sir aapne concern raise kiya tha ticket raise hai. Toh abhi main close kar rahi hu. Baaki aapko abhi video meeting mein hum 5:20 aapko milti hu. Aapko koi bhi issue hota hai hum aap ek baar clear kar lete hain. Abhi sir jaise main aapka ticket close karungi na toh aapko ek feedback jayega ek form jayega satisfaction ka. Toh please aap usme request hai yes kar dijiyega sir. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay. Baaki main aapko connect karti hu. Ek minute aap line pe rahiyega one second sir, one second. Main schedule kar deti hu 5:20 ka meeting ka apna. One second.
Executive: Baaki aur koi concern aapko sir? Inquiries chahiye aur koi query hai aapka sir?
Customer: Nahi iske regarding maine yeh isse isse isse tha matlab mere ko.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Toh toh aapke account manager sir is sir Chandan ji hai na? Chandan ji hai woh aapke account manager. Aapke baat hui hai kabhi unse sir?
Customer: Nahi unko call hi nahi lagta kabhi main request karta hu call ki toh pata.
Executive: Achha achha achha. Actually sir problem yeh hai na ki abhi Chandan ji hai na as of abhi holiday pe hai sir woh abhi medical leave pe hai. Unki tabiyat theek nahi hai abhi. Toh isi wajah se sir woh aapka number nahi lagta hoga agar aap call kar rahe hain unke paas. Toh isliye hum aapko connect kar rahe hain. Senior head baat kar rahe ho toh is haan ji.
Customer: Aur koi option nahi tha mere paas isliye maine system pe generate kiya query.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai, koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Koi problem nahi hai sir. Baaki main aapko abhi connect kar leti hu 5:20 video meeting ke liye. Aur Chandan ji ko sir actually abhi medical leave pe hai is wajah se unka number nahi lag raha hai. Baaki toh wohi aapke account manager hai. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thank you so much sir. Main connect karti hu aapko 5:20.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving call inquiries.

- Account manager not reachable.



Resolution:

- Informed about inquiries in the last 7 days.

- Explained how to check inquiries in lead manager.

- Informed about account manager being on medical leave.

- Scheduled a video meeting for 5:20.

- Closed the ticket and requested feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for 5:20.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, lead manager, account manager, video meeting, ticket closure
